reviews.review_msg: She is really patient and understanding. There is a lot to learn so she expects that homework is done. Her teaching style is awesome because it focuses on repetition. It is easy to learn this way. Classes were organized well and homework was easy. I wish I could take her for SPAN 103.

I don't know whether it was just me, but it seems like she grades really hard. I don't think I did that badly in it yet I got a C. My friend took it during intersession with another lecturer and got an A+ so im kinda iffy on this one
